channel.title: binary tree on sleepingsaint

item.title: Pathsums 2
item.description: Question Given the root of a binary tree and an integer targetSum, return all root-to-leaf paths where each path’s sum equals targetSum. A leaf is a node with no children. Examples Input: root = [5,4,8,11,null,13,4,7,2,null,null,5,1], targetSum = 22 Output: [[5,4,11,2],[5,8,4,5]] Input: root = [1,2,3], targetSum = 5 Output: [] Input: root = [1,2], targetSum = 0 Output: [] Constraints The number of nodes in the tree is in the range [0, 5000].
